name: Bobblehead Mania - Run the Lively Laboratory with Beloved, Charming Figurines invented by Mad Scientist
name_original: Bobblehead Mania - Run the Lively Laboratory with Beloved, Charming Figurines invented by Mad Scientist
description:
Bobblehead Mania is an extremely fun and fantastically exciting endless runner where you can run with iconic bobbleheads!

Simply swipe up to jump over barrels, potholes or incoming characters and swipe down to duck beneath the wheels of death, huge doors or flamethrowers.

Use power-ups to run faster and farther:

-Bobble Rage - smash through obstacles;
-Multiplier - maximize your gains;
-Slow Motion - slow down the run;
-Super Bubble - newly developed mechanic;

Each bobblehead has different special abilities that will make your run feel smoother and enjoyable.

FEATURES

- Varied obstacles and traps that test your reflexes to the max;
- Cool shop and progression system;
- Rewarding daily and weekly missions;
- Achievements system based on badges;
- Compete with your friends on cross-platform leaderboards;

*Many more updates to come soon!

Free for limited time! Hurry up and DOWNLOAD NOW!!!
